post.title: fs: unlocked telus milestone nam (good for att/telus/rogers/bell)
post.content: for sale is a mint unlocked motorola milestone/droid with nam 3g that will work with att, rogers, fido, bell and telus 3g. perfect working condition 9/10. the package will come with: - original box - charger - data cable - headphones - 16gb card - comes with gold seido case $480 shipped. sorry no trades.
